posts.description: A Notorious Hacker Is Trying to Start a ‘Hack Back’ Political Movement | Motherboard
posts.extended: In August of 2014, a hacker shook the cybersecurity world by exposing the secrets of the infamous government surveillance vendor Gamma Group, the makers of the spyware FinFisher. The hacker jokingly called himself Phineas Fisher, publicizing the hack and taunting the company on Twitter.
